author: susankA9522SA
title: Lovely stay - would definitely return. Clean great location, servuce and amenities
text:
We booked thru American Express platinum - the fine hotels program and had upgraded rooms and champagne. Lovely hotel and would return. Allister, the door man was friendly and helpful. Our rooms were large and immaculate. Clarins bath products and very nice breakfast. I recommend highly - we did a long weekend and the location was great for seeing the city. Close to arch and shopping. Beautifully quaint yet high end.
Such a great walking city and so much to see.
